channel.title: Changes for a better beta
channel.description:
http://services.runescape.com/m=news/devblog-changes-for-a-better-beta-
For all the doomsayers who claim jagex do nothing to adjust the game during beta.

item.title: Changes for a better beta
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:

[quote=“RagingPussy, post:10, topic:449619”]yep they sure are improving the game. i laughed my ass off at this today

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QyjephEETS4[/youtube][/quote]

12 year old humor.

Read full topic

item.title: Changes for a better beta
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

they came up with a better way of providing free items in this beta, during the Rs2 beta they had a “glitch” that would allows you to set X any amount for an item in the party chest even if you didn’t have the amount available.

Read full topic

item.title: Changes for a better beta
item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:6, topic:449619”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=552508.msg4048544#msg4048544 date=1342286528]
Just the whole way it works. Normally if I were to go to, say, tormented demons, I could get a kill every 2 minutes or less in WELFARE gear. In the beta, im using all of the special attacks I’m given. I’m duel weilding range and melee weapons. I’m using end-game gear, yet its taking me nearly 10 minutes or more to kill ONE demon. And its not like I’m bad at actually killing them.

I’m also just butthurt than goliaths gloves no longer act as a weapon without one weilded. Now they’re just the best gloves in the game (which IS nice, but its just not the same as uppercutting someone in the jaw).
[/quote]

maybe thats what they wanted, items were getting too overpowered (with old combat) so things have to be rebalanced.[/quote]
I’m agreeing with this, combat in general was a disappointment for pretty much all monsters. With the re-work they have a chance to balance everything out again and maybe bring some excitement back into combat instead of being able to afk most monsters.

Read full topic

item.title: Changes for a better beta
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:7, topic:449619”]I’m thinking I should be able to solo QBD really easily. The ultimate for 2h lets you deal 40% of the targets hp. Which means I could hit a 300,000. 0.o[/quote]Or a 7500 on one wave.

Read full topic

item.title: Changes for a better beta
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:4, topic:449619”]Just the whole way it works. Normally if I were to go to, say, tormented demons, I could get a kill every 2 minutes or less in WELFARE gear. In the beta, im using all of the special attacks I’m given. I’m duel weilding range and melee weapons. I’m using end-game gear, yet its taking me nearly 10 minutes or more to kill ONE demon. And its not like I’m bad at actually killing them.

I’m also just butthurt than goliaths gloves no longer act as a weapon without one weilded. Now they’re just the best gloves in the game (which IS nice, but its just not the same as uppercutting someone in the jaw).[/quote]

maybe thats what they wanted, items were getting too overpowered (with old combat) so things have to be rebalanced.

Although i havent played the beta so i dont even know how any of it works.

Read full topic

item.title: Changes for a better beta
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Just the whole way it works. Normally if I were to go to, say, tormented demons, I could get a kill every 2 minutes or less in WELFARE gear. In the beta, im using all of the special attacks I’m given. I’m duel weilding range and melee weapons. I’m using end-game gear, yet its taking me nearly 10 minutes or more to kill ONE demon. And its not like I’m bad at actually killing them.

I’m also just butthurt than goliaths gloves no longer act as a weapon without one weilded. Now they’re just the best gloves in the game (which IS nice, but its just not the same as uppercutting someone in the jaw).

item.title: Changes for a better beta
item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

rip4d:

Tried it again this morning. I must say, it is a lot better. PvM has improved quite a bit (although it still kinda sucks imo) since last weekend. Also, the Royal Crossbow is now a 2H crossbow. And DAMN is it a nice one.

Just curious but why do you think that pvm sucks on the beta?

Read full topic

item.title: Changes for a better beta
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

RuneScape

DevBlog: Changes for a Better Beta

Beta has been running for just over two weeks now and we've had an amazing amount of feedback. We're not just tuning and tweaking but making some real core changes based on what you've been saying. Mod Hew highlights a few of the things we've changed...

For all the doomsayers who claim jagex do nothing to adjust the game during beta.

Read full topic
